title: Can Goldman's Expansion in Private Equity Credit Drive Growth? - Yahoo Finance
summary:
In sync with this, in October 2025, Goldman agreed to acquire Industry Ventures, a leading venture capital platform that invests across all stages of the venture capital lifecycle.
Further, Goldman is expanding its private equity credit services internationally, focusing on Europe, the U.K. and Asia.

title: Stellus Private Credit BDC Reports Results for its Third Fiscal Quarter Ended September 30, 2025 - PR Newswire
summary:
HOUSTON, Nov. 14, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Stellus Private Credit BDC ("Stellus PBDC", "we", or the "Company") today announced financial results for its third fiscal quarter ended September 30, 2025.
Gross operating expenses for the three months ended September 30, 2025 and 2024 totaled $6.1 million and $4.6 million, respectively.

About Stellus Private Credit BDC The Company is an externally-managed, closed-end, non-diversified investment management company that has elected to be regulated as a business development company under the Investment Company Act of 1940, as amended.
